amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent the President from proposing any rescission of funds appropriated by Congress for the Corps of Engineers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-389 to prevent the President from proposing any rescission to funds appropriated by Congress to the Corps of Engineers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Alexander amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 300 (Roll no. 45).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Alexander.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Alexander amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 300 (Roll no. 45).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
